name: Matches
description: Finds the (global) matches in a string based on a regular expression

arguments.name: Input
arguments.description: The string to search for matches in

arguments.name: Regular expression
arguments.description: The regular expression to use for matching

arguments.name: Global search
arguments.description: Test the regular expression against all possible matches in a string

arguments.name: Case insensitive
arguments.description: Ignore case while attempting a match in a string

arguments.name: Multi line
arguments.description: Treat multiline strings as multiple lines
